LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_Mana_Desc: The amount of mana a arcane plant can store at maximum.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFlux_Desc: The daily mana fluctuation of this arcane plant. Mana can be produced by certain arcane plants when fertilized or under suitable conditions, and is not consumed when packaged.\nIf reserved mana is at maximum, any overproduced mana is transferred to adjacent connected arcane plants.
